summary: I’m really sad that fjord, jester and yasha are gone but at the same time i’m reall excited that the remaining neiners are...
body:
I’m really sad that fjord, jester and yasha are gone but at the same time i’m reall excited that the remaining neiners are literally wildemount’s biggest disasters.

you got caleb and beau as the most socially awkward humans to exist, alcoholic disaster rogue nott and mollymauk “i think i’m the most charming person in the world but my charisma is 11 and i’m a purple carnie” tealeaf.

summary: Pre-kidnapping the m9 were heading to the shadiest place in the world (Shady Creek Run) and I’m super worried the group is going...
body: Pre-kidnapping the m9 were heading to the shadiest place in the world (Shady Creek Run) and I’m super worried the group is going to get on the bad side of the Gentleman by skipping out on his job to go look for their friends but then maybe instead they figure that any unsavory business might be connected to Shady Creek? And hopefully to give Travis and Laura enough time to adjust they agree to work the job in exchange for info about where their friends might’ve been taken to so Matt can drag the absence on as long as they need

summary: “that is my very best friend.” … “I choose… my buddy pike.”  a pike and grog playlist.  tracklist below the cut.[[MORE]] we’re...
caption:
“that is my very best friend.” … “I choose… my buddy pike.”

a pike and grog playlist. 

tracklist below the cut.

we’re going to be friends // jack johnson

we don’t notice any time pass / we don’t notice anything / we sit side by side in every class / the teacher thinks that i sound funny / but she likes the way you sing

hey brother // avicii

oh, if the sky comes falling down, for you / there’s nothing in this world i wouldn’t do

twin size mattress // the front bottoms

this is for the lions living in the wiry broke down frames of my friends’ bodies / when the floodwater comes, it ain’t gonna be clear, it’s gonna look like mud / but i will help you swim, i will help you swim, i’m gonna help you swim

gaits galore // micah thompson

instrumental

outlaws // delta rae

don’t you know that we’re outlaws? / giving the finger to death itself / we got no one to hide from / we got no one to toast our health

best friend // sofi tukker, nervo, the knocks, alisa ueno

that’s the way it is / that’s the way it goes / it’s just us two, it’s deja-vu, it’s what we know

haven’t you heard? // the north panics

we ain’t got no homes, just attitudes / you ask who we are, nah, who are you? / we ain’t got no guilt, won’t hesitate / so back off or we’ll put you in your place

no promises // san fermin

i won’t promise you if you follow me around / i won’t let you down, i won’t let you down / been wandering who’s to say if we’ll be found

homemade dynamite // lorde

seeing me rolling, showing someone else love / dancing with our shoes off / know i think you’re awesome, right?

golden years // dia frampton

you’re out of luck / you’re out of line / we don’t apologize / we’re hammers on the door

hurricane // misterwives

we are not your property / see with our own clarity / ears close, eyes open, voice won’t be broken / won’t dance within your walls

soldier // gavin degraw

where did all the people go? / they got scared when the lights went low / i’ll get you through it nice and slow / when the world’s spinning out of control

back home // andy grammer

so here’s to the cheap sunglasses / red bull and minivans and / people who had your back when / the world didn’t understand

blood brothers // ingrid michaelson

what you need, what you need i need too / what you are, what you are i am too

hebrews 11:40 // the mountain goats

invent my own family if it comes to that / hold them close, hold them near / tell them no one’s ever going to hurt them here

high tide or low tide // ben harper, jack johnson

so in high tide or in low tide / i’ll be by your side / you know that i’ll be by your side

rivers and roads // the head and the heart

now nothing is as it has been / and i miss your face like hell / and i guess it’s just as well / but i miss your face like hell

marchin on // onerepublic

we’ll have the days we break / and we’ll have the scars to prove it / we’ll have the bonds that we saved / but we’ll have the heart / not to lose it

family // mother mother

a motley crew, a rodeo / a goddamn zoo, a circus show / but oh don’t you know how it goes / we are all walking each other home

you are my sunshine (version 2) // elizabeth mitchell

you’ll never know, dear / how much i love you / please don’t take my sunshine away

home // phillip phillips

the trouble it might drag you down / if you get lost, you can always be found

“that is my very best friend.” … “I choose… my buddy pike.”

a pike and grog playlist. 

tracklist below the cut.

summary: Nott and Yasha bonding over the weird food they both like.
question: Nott and Yasha bonding over the weird food they both like.
answer:
As they make camp for the night, Caleb gets a fire started with a weakened Firebolt. Within the hour, its a decent cooking fire.

Yasha kneels by the glowing coals, oblivious to Beau’s watchful eye. She reaches into her pack and pulls the rat from within, cleaning it quickly and clinically.

This catches Nott’s attention. She loves a medium-well rat. “You’ve been holding out on me this whole time?”

Yasha turns the now skewered carcass on a crudely constructed spit. “I… wasn’t aware I was um. Holding out. On anyone,” the Aasimar replies. “I can share it with you? If you like?” She says quietly.

Nott takes all of half a second to accept the Barbarian’s offer. “I have a toad I can throw in,” she says, digging into her pockets. “Tastes like chicken, they say. Wouldn’t know,myself. Never had it.”

Yasha offers a shrug in response. “Chickens are overrated. We had it in the circus all the time.” She turns the spit thoughtfully as the rat cooks. “Pigeon, however…”

Nott nods heartily in agreement as she skewers her toad.

Nott takes all of half a second to accept the Barbarian’s offer. “I have a toad I can throw in,” she says, digging into her pockets. “Tastes like chicken, they say. Wouldn’t know,myself. Never had it.”

blog.name: starsodaart
blog.title: though the stars may fall
blog.description:
</br>
Kit | 23 | he/him </br>
just here to draw and have fun </br>
**do not repost, sell, or use my art without permission** </br> 
Reposters will be blocked immediately

summary: Jude placed the final block atop his carefully constructed tower. “Okay,” he said with all the seriousness a 5 year old can...
caption:
Jude placed the final block atop his carefully constructed tower. “Okay,” he said with all the seriousness a 5 year old can muster. “We have to take turns pulling until the tower falls.”

Gayle smirked at her youngest brother. “I won’t go easy on you.”

Jude smiles in return as Leila comes to squat beside him with Kiri in tow. “You shouldn’t especially since it’s girls versus boys.” This earns him a clap on his shoulder from Austin.

Leila looks to Kiri and remarks “Don’t worry, Kiri. We’ll show them!”

Kiri’s feathers fluff up around her neck as she nods. “Don’t worry,” she mimics in Leila’s voice.

The Schuester children gather around Jude’s block tower as Austin pulls the first rectangular piece and the tower crumbles to the ground.

“This is rigged!” He exclaims. “Let’s start over.”

“Go fuck yourself,” Kiri replies, earning a scandalized gasp from Gayle.

“We really need to work on what’s said around her,” the oldest girl advises.

summary: y’all i’m absolutely screaming right now. long story short, i decided to calculate everyone’s height based off of nott’s height,...
body:
y’all i’m absolutely screaming right now.

long story short, i decided to calculate everyone’s height based off of nott’s height, since she’s the only one with a canon height at the moment, and i used official art to get a decent idea of where the top of nott’s head comes to on everyone.

i used the comparing heights website, and fiddled around inserting numbers until it looked right, or at lest close enough, and i can’t believe what i ended up with.

nott - canonically 3 foot even 
jester - 4'10
beauregard - 5 foot even
caleb - 5'8"
yasha - 5'11" (which fits with ashley saying that yasha is just under 6 feet tall, even tho i’m still convinced yasha is taller than 6 feet)
mollymauk - 6 foot even
fjord - 6'3"ish 

keep in mind that this is just my estimates, based on the official art, and it’s entirely possible that the proportions in the official art are not 100% accurate, but as surprising as some of these numbers are, i feel like they fit for the most part.

my only objection is yasha, who i’m still convinced is taller than 6 foot.

anyways. that’s all for robin’s fun fact of the day, and i’m sharing this, because i’m probably going to be sticking to these heights for fanart :p

blog.name: admintan
blog.title: FEELS TRAIN
blog.description: In a room in a house there lived a tumblr user. Not a pretty, clean room with sunshine and roses, but a dirty, messy room filled with dirty socks and moldy plates: it was a tumblr-room, and that means online friends, free time and no life.

summary:
Laura and Travis leaving for a little bit is both a blessing and a curse.
Jester and Fjord are the talkers, the people persons,...
body:
Laura and Travis leaving for a little bit is both a blessing and a curse.

Jester and Fjord are the talkers, the people persons, the mediators. They are the glue that holds the M9 together because in the beginning if those 4 were left to their own devices they woule have either killed each other or moved on by now. So it’s kind of a curse because who the fuck is going keep all those idiots alive??

It’s also a blessing because they’ve been together for a month now and so they won’t kill each other. They’ll probably grate on each other’s nerves a lot and but heads so fucking much but then they might start to realise “wait a second, we actually work well together.” and there’s gonna be new dynamics like Molly and Nott and there will be more in depth interaction on dynamics we wanna see more like Caleb and Beau and Molly and Caleb.

And by the time they find those three again, they’ll be a little better at the whole teamwork thing and talking and they’ll be a more confident unit. We all hope at least.

I think those four will be okay, especially depending on who the guests are.
